main.name: Ahmed Hamdy
main.bio: Passionate Javascript developer with over 3 years of front-end experience building responsive web apps using React, Redux and Bootstrap, in addition to 1 year of web development experience using MERN stack.
main.contactmessage: Let's get in touch if you want to implement something or just want to DEDUCK

resume.skillmessage: Very comfortable working with Javascript, React.js, Express.js and Bootstrap, also sharpening my skills with MongoDB, Node.js, Blockchain and python

education.description: Gathered strong knowledge about OOP and databases, also ranked first in the class of problem solving during year one
